services.name: AC Repair
description: Detailed issue diagnosis with same day resolution if possible.
Visit Charges of 299 INR will be adjusted in the final bill.
included: Accurate inspection of followed by repair quotation
Adjustment of inspection fee (INR 599) in invoice
AC  repair using high-quality spare parts & tools
Final check and cleanup

services.name: Gas Leak fix and Repair
description: Through diagnosis, leak identification & fixing gas.
included: Accurate inspection of followed by repair quotation
Adjustment of inspection fee (INR 599) in invoice
AC  repair using high-quality spare parts & tools
Final check and cleanup
Note: For cooling coil damage in 3 or more areas, and extra INR 500 applies for complete leak repair
Ladder is not carried by technicians. Please arrange if AC is height

services.name: Split AC install
description: Installation of indoor & outdoor with Free gas check.
Procurment of Spare parts at extra cost.
included: Drilling, wiring connections, installtion of the units (indorr and outdoor) & pipe fixes
Gas check to prevent leakages
Cooling Rate and device check
Final check and cleanup

services.name: Window AC install
description: Installation of indoor & outdoor with Free gas check.

included: Drilling, wiring connections, installtion of the units (indorr and outdoor) & pipe fixes

excluded: Unistalltion of existing AC

services.name: AC Uninstall Any
